trans-unit.source: Provides a default implementation for a lifetime sponsor class.
trans-unit.target: Inneholder en Standardimplementering for en levetid sponsorer klasse.

trans-unit.source: The current lifetime sponsor implementation can be used to sponsor objects by specifying the required renewal <xref:System.TimeSpan>.
trans-unit.target: Gjeldende levetid sponsorer implementeringen kan brukes til å sponsor objekter ved å angi den obligatoriske fornyelsen <xref:System.TimeSpan>.</xref:System.TimeSpan>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > This class makes a link demand and an inheritance demand at the class level.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > Denne klassen er en kobling behov, og en arv behov på klasse-nivå.

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Security.SecurityException> is thrown when either the immediate caller or the derived class does not have infrastructure permission.
trans-unit.target: En <xref:System.Security.SecurityException>forårsakes når umiddelbar oppkalleren eller den utledede klassen ikke har tillatelse for infrastruktur.</xref:System.Security.SecurityException>

trans-unit.source: For details about security demands, see [Link Demands](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md) and [Inheritance Demands](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/28b9adbb-8f08-4f10-b856-dbf59eb932d9).
trans-unit.target: For mer informasjon om krav for sikkerhet, kan du se [koblingen krav](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md) og [arv krav](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/28b9adbb-8f08-4f10-b856-dbf59eb932d9).

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Runtime.Remoting.Lifetime.ClientSponsor"></xref> class with default values.
trans-unit.target: Initialiserer en ny forekomst av den <xref href="System.Runtime.Remoting.Lifetime.ClientSponsor"> </xref> klasse standardverdier.

trans-unit.source: The default time by which the lifetime of a sponsored object is increased when renewal is requested to 2 minutes.
trans-unit.target: Standardtidspunktet som levetiden for et sponset objekt økes når fornyelsen forespørres til 2 minutter.

trans-unit.source: For more information on the renewal time, see the <xref:System.Runtime.Remoting.Lifetime.LifetimeServices.RenewOnCallTime%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property.
trans-unit.target: For mer informasjon om fornyelse tidspunktet, kan du se den <xref:System.Runtime.Remoting.Lifetime.LifetimeServices.RenewOnCallTime%2A?displayProperty=fullName>egenskapen.</xref:System.Runtime.Remoting.Lifetime.LifetimeServices.RenewOnCallTime%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Runtime.Remoting.Lifetime.ClientSponsor"></xref> class with the renewal time of the sponsored object.
trans-unit.target: Initialiserer en ny forekomst av den <xref href="System.Runtime.Remoting.Lifetime.ClientSponsor"> </xref> objektklassen med fornyelse tidspunktet sponset.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.TimeSpan> by which to increase the lifetime of the sponsored objects when renewal is requested.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.TimeSpan>vil øke levetiden for sponset objektene når fornyelsen forespørres.</xref:System.TimeSpan>

trans-unit.source: Empties the list objects registered with the current <xref href="System.Runtime.Remoting.Lifetime.ClientSponsor"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Tomemballasje listeobjekter som er registrert med gjeldende <xref href="System.Runtime.Remoting.Lifetime.ClientSponsor"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Frees the resources of the current <xref href="System.Runtime.Remoting.Lifetime.ClientSponsor"></xref> before the garbage collector reclaims them.
trans-unit.target: Frigjør ressurser for gjeldende <xref href="System.Runtime.Remoting.Lifetime.ClientSponsor"> </xref> før saneringsoppsamlingen reclaims dem.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of <xref href="System.Runtime.Remoting.Lifetime.ClientSponsor"></xref>, providing a lease for the current object.
trans-unit.target: Initialiserer en ny forekomst av <xref href="System.Runtime.Remoting.Lifetime.ClientSponsor"> </xref>, som gir en leasingavtalen for det gjeldende objektet.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see <xref:System.MarshalByRefObject.InitializeLifetimeService%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.
trans-unit.target: Hvis du vil ha mer informasjon, kan du se <xref:System.MarshalByRefObject.InitializeLifetimeService%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.</xref:System.MarshalByRefObject.InitializeLifetimeService%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: An <xref href="System.Runtime.Remoting.Lifetime.ILease"></xref> for the current object.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.Runtime.Remoting.Lifetime.ILease"> </xref> for det gjeldende objektet.

trans-unit.source: Registers the specified <xref href="System.MarshalByRefObject"></xref> for sponsorship.
trans-unit.target: Registrerer den angitte <xref href="System.MarshalByRefObject"> </xref> for sponsing.

trans-unit.source: The object to register for sponsorship with the <xref href="System.Runtime.Remoting.Lifetime.ClientSponsor"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Objektet for å registrere deg for sponsing med den <xref href="System.Runtime.Remoting.Lifetime.ClientSponsor"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if registration succeeded; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Hvis var vellykket registrering; Ellers <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Requests a sponsoring client to renew the lease for the specified object.
trans-unit.target: Ber om en sponset klient fornye leasingavtalen for det angitte objektet.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Runtime.Remoting.Lifetime.ISponsor.Renewal%2A> method is called by the distributed garbage collector to renew the lease for the specified object.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Runtime.Remoting.Lifetime.ISponsor.Renewal%2A>-metoden av distribuerte saneringsoppsamlingen fornye leasingavtalen for det angitte objektet.</xref:System.Runtime.Remoting.Lifetime.ISponsor.Renewal%2A>

trans-unit.source: The lifetime lease of the object that requires lease renewal.
trans-unit.target: Levetid leasingavtalen for objektet som krever fornyelsen leasingavtalen.

trans-unit.source: The additional lease time for the specified object.
trans-unit.target: Den ekstra leietiden for det angitte objektet.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the <xref:System.TimeSpan> by which to increase the lifetime of the sponsored objects when renewal is requested.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir den <xref:System.TimeSpan>vil øke levetiden for sponset objektene når fornyelsen forespørres.</xref:System.TimeSpan>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.TimeSpan> by which to increase the lifetime of the sponsored objects when renewal is requested.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.TimeSpan>vil øke levetiden for sponset objektene når fornyelsen forespørres.</xref:System.TimeSpan>

trans-unit.source: Unregisters the specified <xref href="System.MarshalByRefObject"></xref> from the list of objects sponsored by the current <xref href="System.Runtime.Remoting.Lifetime.ClientSponsor"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Fjerner registreringer av den angitte <xref href="System.MarshalByRefObject"> </xref> fra listen over objekter sponset av gjeldende <xref href="System.Runtime.Remoting.Lifetime.ClientSponsor"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The object to unregister.
trans-unit.target: Objektet som.
